page.title: 18Schools Co-operation
page.content: Our school works with{four other {schools}in lessons, visits and journeys. We have a{mini-bus}and all fourth years{work together in one {school.}When they have had their turn it works the same way for all years. We also have an{extra teacher}who we share. Just after Easter we did a {joint production}about children in the war. I think co-operation is a good idea because if we didn't join up we wouldn't be able to do joint productions because there would be too many parts. In the lessons it is good because you get to know what the other schools do and we have{different {teachers.}One teacher said that it was going very successfully because it gave children a chance to meet more children and it gave fourth years a chance to meet the children they will work with.Everybody liked co-operation
